name: semantic-styled-ui
description: Set of UI components based of Semantic UI with Styled Components
author: Zach Hardesty <hello@zachhardesty.com> (https://zachhardesty.com)

scripts.register:all: yarn run register:react && yarn run register:react-dom && yarn run register:styled-components && yarn run register:semantic-ui-css
scripts.link:all: yarn link react && yarn link react-dom && yarn link styled-components && yarn link semantic-ui-css
scripts.link:gc: cross-env-shell LINKSSUI=../../../work/gulfcorp/website/node_modules yarn run register:all && yarn run link:all
scripts.link:cd: cross-env-shell LINKSSUI=../../../work/connectdoor/website/node_modules yarn run register:all && yarn run link:all
scripts.link:zh: cross-env-shell LINKSSUI=../zachhardesty.com/node_modules yarn run register:all && yarn run link:all
scripts.link:ls: echo $(tput bold)currently linked pkgs, view yarn link:lsa for pkg locations:$(tput sgr0); (ls -l node_modules; ls -l node_modules/@*) | grep ^l | grep -o "[[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]] [[:digit:]][[:digit:]].*$"
scripts.link:lsa: echo $(tput bold)linkable / registered pkgs:$(tput sgr0); ls -la ~/.config/yarn/link/ | grep ^l | grep -o "[[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]][[:alpha:]] [[:digit:]][[:digit:]].*$"
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run babel
